attributes.title: Stop the Hindu Holocaust! Volume 6
attributes.description:
*PARAMASHIVA'S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA (26th April 2020)

*LISTEN: HINDUISM IS THE SCIENCE OF COSMIC BEINGS MANIFESTING ALL THE BEST THINGS FOR HUMAN BEINGS. HINDUISM IS NOT LAND GRABBING, NATION GRABBING, POWER GRABBING, HUMAN GRABBING, IDEOLOGY OR PRINCIPLE OR MANUAL.

*AS THE COMMON WORLD UNDERSTANDS RELIGION WITH A LOT OF LOAD, HOW SO MANY COMMITTEES IN THE NAME OF RELIGION AND HOW MANY RELIGIOUS BOOKS HAVE ALLOWED IT OR ENCOURAGED IT, WITH ALL THAT LOAD, COMMON MAN UNDERSTANDS RELIGION.

*BUT I WANT WHOLE HUMANITY TO UNDERSTAND: HINDUISM IS UNIQUE BECAUSE IT IS ABSOLUTE LIFE-POSITIVE.

*THE FUNDAMENTAL CORE PRINCIPLES OF HINDUISM IS NEITHER LAND GRABBING OR BRAINWASHING OR TRYING TO BECOME POWER CENTER OR KIND OF AN IDEOLOGY ESTABLISHED BY SOMEBODY TO HAVE CONTROL OVER OTHERS - NOTHING OF THIS.

*HINDUISM IS PURELY COSMIC BEINGS BRINGING ALL THE BEST THINGS OF THE COSMOS AND GIFTING IT TO HUMAN BEINGS.

*THE GREAT COSMIC BEINGS, LIKE HOW THEY EXIST, COMPLEMENTING EACH OTHER, HOW THE INTENSE ONENESS AMONGST THEM IS POWERFUL, EXTREMELY EXTRAORDINARY, HOW UNDERSTANDING COSMIC LOGIC CAN MAKE OUR LIVES MORE COMFORTABLE, BLISSFUL, LUXURIOUS, SAME WAY, EVEN ONE OR TWO COSMIC PRINCIPLES IF YOU CAN GRASP, THE VERY BRAIN’S PHYSICAL STRUCTURE WILL CHANGE, NOT JUST THE WAY YOU COGNISE THINGS!

*JUST ONE PRINCIPLE: “YOU DON'T HAVE DEATH. YOU JUST MOVE TO ANOTHER BODY,’ IS ACTUALLY A REALITY. ‘YOU HAVE ONLY ONE BODY AND YOU ARE BORN AND DEAD’, IS BINARY LOGIC - TOO CHEAP AND TOO MEDIOCRE, POOR. THIS ‘ONE BIRTH THEORY’ IS SUCH AN ABSOLUTE MEDIOCRE. IN SCIENTIFIC AGE, PEOPLE SHOULD NOT BE CAUGHT IN THIS STUPID SUPERSTITION OF ‘ONE BIRTH THEORY’.

*FEAR IS THE WORST OBSESSIVE COMPULSIVE DISORDER (OCD). THE WORST OCD IS FEAR. YOU CAN MAKE ALL FEARS IRRELEVANT IN YOUR LIFE IF YOU UNDERSTAND FEW BASIC COSMIC PRINCIPLES.

*EVEN IF YOU INTELLECTUALLY START ANALYSING THE TRUTH, FEAR WILL BECOME IRRELEVANT WE ARE ALL MADE OUT IF THE STUFF CONSCIOUSNESS. ĪŚĀ VĀSYAMIDAṀ SARVAṀ. FIRST UPANISHAD, FIRST VERSE.

*SCIENCE IS SLOWLY CATCHING UP. RECENTLY I READ AN ARTICLE, THEY ARE TRYING TO ESTABLISH VERY POWERFULLY THAT THE WHOLE UNIVERSE IS A GIANT BRAIN AND IT MAYBE CONSCIOUS!

*BRAIN OF A HUMAN BEING MUST INTRANALISE THIS ONE TRUTH: WE ARE ALL MADE OUT OF A FABRIC CALLED CONSCIOUSNESS, ALIVE, LIVING, RESPONSIBLE AND ABLE TO RESPOND, PERCEIVE, EXIST, RESPOND, SURVIVE, EXPAND, WE ARE ALL MADE OUT OF THAT FABRIC CALLED CONSCIOUSNESS. THE HUMAN BEING WHO HAS GRASPED THIS COSMIC PRINCIPLE BY SHRAVANA, MANANA AND NIDIDHYASANA - LISTENING, CONTEMPLATING AND MANIFESTING, AND ONE WHO HASN'T GRASPED THIS, THE VERY PHYSICAL SHAPE OF THE BRAIN WILL BE CHANGED.

*I AM A BEING FROM KAILASA. THE SPACE OF COSMOS WHERE COSMIC BEINGS LIVE COMPLEMENTING EACH OTHER. THERE IS NOT ONLY NO CONTRADICTION, THERE IS ONLY ABSOLUTE ONENESS.

*HINDUISM IS ALL ABOUT THE COSMIC BEINGS COMING TO A HUMAN PLANET AND SHARING ALL THESE GREAT PRINCIPLES, POWERS, TO HUMAN BEINGS AND MAPPING IT TO THE LEVEL OF HUMAN CONSCIOUS UNDERSTANDING AND MAKING IT USER FRIENDLY AND LIFESTYLE OF HUMAN BEINGS, THAT'S ALL.

*I HAVE PUT HINDUISM AND MY MISSION IN NUTSHELL FORM! IN NUTSHELL FORM, I HAVE PRESENTED AN INITIAL INTRODUCTION NOW I WILL REALLY MAKE YOU ALL COGNISE THIS TRUTH. THE PARAMASHIVA IN ME WILL MANIFEST IN ALL OF YOU AS DAKSHINAMURTHY - THE ULTIMATE GURU PRINCIPLE AND MAKE YOU ALL UNDERSTAND ALL THE GREAT TRUTHS TODAY I REVEALED IN THE SATSANG STEP BY STEP. I WILL MAKE THE WORST OCD WITH WHICH YOU ARE SUFFERING - OCD - IRRELEVANT IN YOUR LIFE. THAT IS MY COMMITMENT TO ALL OF YOU. SO YOU CAN JUST RAISE YOURSELF TO THE NEXT LEVEL OF EXISTENCE.

*PEOPLE WHO ARE TRYING TO KILL HINDUISM ARE ACTUALLY COMMITTING SUICIDE.

*END OF HINDUISM IS END OF HUMANITY. AS LONG AS THESE HINDU PRINCIPLES ARE KEPT ALIVE, MORE NUMBER OF PEOPLE UNDERSTAND AND PRACTICE, BETTER FOR HUMANITY. HINDUISM IS NOT LAND GRABBING, BRAINWASHING, CONVERTING, TERRORISTIC, POWER CENTRIC, RELIGION. IT IS MAKING YOU UNDERSTAND THE COSMIC LOGIC AND CONSTITUTION AND MAKING COEXISTENCE COMPLEMENTING EACH OTHER MORE THAN CONTRADICTING OF CONFLICTING EACH OTHER.

*STOP THE HINDU HOLOCAUST TO SAVE PLANET EARTH AND HUMANITY.
